{% endraw %} {% raw %}

addition[source]

addition(a:Union[int, float], b:Union[int, float])

A simple addition function. Add a to b.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

How to use:

{% raw %} 
a = 2; b = 4.5
result = addition(a, b)
print(result)

6.5
{% endraw %}

tests:

{% raw %} 
test_eq(addition(1,2), 3)
test_eq(addition(1.4, 1.9), 3.3)
test_eq(addition(-1.4, 1.9), 0.5)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

multiply[source]

multiply(a:float, b:float)

fn multiplies two values a and b

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

examples:

{% raw %} 
a = 2.1 ; b=7.6
multiply(a,b)

15.959999999999999
{% endraw %}

tests

{% raw %} 
test_eq(multiply(2.0, 2.0), 4.0)
{% endraw %}
